_description: A variant of st. 5 of 3659, occurring separately in Rolle’s Meditations on the Passion (Text A only)

CULLl18.Transcription:
Gloryouse lord so doolfully dyȝte So rewfully streynyd vp
                    ryȝt on þe crosfor þy mykel mekenesse þi mercy þy
                    myȝtþu bete al my bale with bote of þi blood
